author: Special Correspondent
text: A total of 14,388 students – 7,112 boys and 7,276 girls, will appear for the Plus Two examination to commence on Tuesday. In a release issued here on Monday, S. Ganesh, District Collector, said that 137 flying squads – 65 in Pudukottai district and 72 in Aranthangi educational district have been set up for the examination.
title: 14,388 to write Plus Two examination today
